name: Giant Vampire Bat
movement: flies swiftly at 60 feet and walks slowly at 10 feet
description: The Giant Vampire Bat is a large beast with a formidable wingspan, capable of swift flight. Its powerful bite delivers both piercing and necrotic damage, allowing it to recover health from its prey.
memorable: It grapples and drains the life from its victims, making it a lingering threat in combat.
goals: Primarily hunts for blood to sustain itself, seeking out weakened or incapacitated foes.
relations: May be found in caves or dark forests, often in areas with other nocturnal creatures.
environment: Commonly inhabits dark caves or forests where it can roost and find prey.
strengths: High Strength and Dexterity make it agile and powerful in combat.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence and Charisma make it ineffective in social situations.
attacks: Bite attack that deals piercing and necrotic damage, capable of grappling its target.
most_powerful_ability: Regains health by dealing necrotic damage with its bite while grappling.
senses: Possesses blindsight within 60 feet, allowing it to sense its environment without sight, though it is hindered if deafened.
skills: Utilizes keen hearing which grants it advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks related to sound.
additional_information: Can fly quickly, dodging attacks effectively
Grapples victims to prevent them from escaping
Excellent ambusher due to stealth and flight
Can only regain health through its necrotic bite
test_queries: agile beast with deadly bite attack
nocturnal vampire bat that recovers health
stealthy creature that grapples its prey
swift flying beast found in dark caves
